column6: "GOLGOTHA" Part 3 (of 5) A strange madness is striking mutants in Los Angeles, driving them to commit unspeakable acts. The X-Men must discover the cause and stop it...before it strikes them as well!
column8: | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Peter Milligan | letterer:Rus Wooton
